INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am a fairly new teacher with a degree in English literature. In my mixed age 1-3rd grade classroom, we often do STEM experiments/activities, but I often feel limited by my knowledge and experience is STEM subjects. I want to expand my knowledge so I can be a better overall teacher and create better experiences for my students.

Other interesting experience:
I enjoy documentaries and baking. Audiobooks are one of my very favorite things, and I'll listen to everything from self-help to science fiction. I am a trained classical singer and was briefly a professional opera singer before changing gears to teaching. I speak Spanish and love to travel.
